div.p:
Let's scan the battle area first. We can change our view by
using the WASD keys, with the Q and E keys rotating the camera.

If we scroll the mouse-wheel, we can zoom closer to our ships.
Double clicking a ship or its card, centres and zooms the camera

Before a battle we must deploy our fleet. At this point, we can
position our ships anywhere within the outlined zone.

Placing and positioning ships is simple â€“ just left-click on a ship
to select, then right-click a location to drop it down.

We can also change a ship's heading. With a ship selected
and the right mouse button held down, we move the the mouse right

and left until we get the angle we're after. Release the
mouse button to set the new heading.
